document_data.caption: A bristle spider stands to the right of a [[phase spider]].
document_data.name: Bristle Spider
document_data.mainbody: '''Bristle spiders''' were a species of monstrously sized [[spider]], covered in needle-like bristles, that emerged in the Realms following the [[Spellplague]].
document_data.Abilities: These spiders could spray their prey with an [[acid]]ic [[poison]] and launch a barrage of their body's bristles. They could also [[tremorsense|detect and precisely locate vibration]]s in their surroundings.
document_data.Combat: When confronting prey a bristle spider would launch a barrage of their bristles, disorienting and temporarily blinding them, and would then move in to spray them with their acidic poison.

Ecology.Habitats: Bristle spiders were known to be found either in vast, overgrown jungles or underground.
Ecology.Relationships:
These creatures were prized by both [[drow]] and [[ettercap]]s as guardians and companions, though other intelligent races were known to train them as well. In particular, [[oni]] trained them to serve as guardians and [[mount]]s.

For the sake of attacking prey, wild bristle spiders would often ally themselves with drow or [[drider]]s.

document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], bristle spiders could be found beneath the ruins of [[Cragmire Keep]], inside the [[Cragmire]] family's crypts, Around that time they could also be found in the pit fights conducted by the [[Gray Wolf tribe]] in [[Vellosk]].
